org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization

Interface BuiltInConverters

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuiltInConverters.Mixin

    @Mixins(value=BuiltInConverters.Mixin.class)
public interface BuiltInConverters
    Built-in serialization converters. Mixin for Serialization implementations that provides built-in Converters for the following types:
    • Identity
    • EntityReference
    • BigDecimal
    • BigInteger
    • Instant
    • ZonedDateTime
    • OffsetDateTime
    • LocalDateTime
    • LocalDate
    • LocalTime
    • Duration
    • Period
    Note that this does not include String nor primitive values and their boxed counterparts. Serialization implementations must handle those.
